DEMO_330_MSG_010: ̃You've already defeated Azamook! As expected by the one Lucia praised so much!
DEMO_330_MSG_100: ̃If you find Lucia there, let her know what happened here.
DEMO_330_MSG_030:
̃A long time ago... we swore to Lucia never to fight amongst one another again.
ā
DEMO_330_MSG_110:
̃On the other side of Polar Park, you should find the transporter device leading to the Darkiron Bastille.
ā
DEMO_330_MSG_040: ̃She promised to end our dispute... by making our lands green again. We believed in Lucia's words.
DEMO_330_MSG_120: ̃You've helped us a great deal. Come back and visit us anytime you please.
DEMO_330_MSG_050:
̃Hmm... Toto, take a look at that! Even in this cold climate, it grows flawlessly!
ā
DEMO_330_MSG_060: ̃This is our "hope"! Surely, this plant will change this world.
DEMO_330_MSG_070: ̃It's only a shrub, Silver. It has yet to fully blossom.
DEMO_330_MSG_080: ̃Then the time has not come yet. We shall continue to wait it out...
DEMO_330_MSG_090:
̃You plan to pursue Lucia, ȁ? Meaning you're heading to the Darkiron Bastille next?
ā
